name: Grandia Memorial Package
overview: Grandia Memorial Package (グランディア　メモリアルパッケージ) is an RPG game, developed by Game Arts Co., Ltd. / Entertainment Software Publishing (ESP) / Ikusabune / Kouyousha Ltd. / Neverland Company / Vanguard Co., Ltd. and published by Game Arts Co., Ltd., which was released in Japan in 1998 for the Sega Saturn.
